project_overview.platform_description: MejoresFinanzas is a comprehensive financial wellness blog platform designed to provide valuable financial education, credit card recommendations, and personal finance tools. Building upon the proven success of BudgetBee and UK TopFinanzas, this platform combines the best features from both systems to create an optimized experience for diverse markets.
project_overview.core_purpose: To democratize financial education and empower users with unbiased financial guidance, practical budgeting strategies, and personalized credit card recommendations through an accessible, mobile-first platform.
unique_value_proposition: High-quality English financial content with plans for Spanish localization
Comprehensive financial advice addressing diverse market needs
No-cost, unbiased credit card comparison and recommendations
Interactive tools including multi-step quizzes with personalized results
GDPR and privacy-compliant lead generation system

technical_foundation.interactive_features: Credit card quiz and recommendation engine
technical_foundation.performance: Astro.js static site generation for optimal speed

pain_points: Limited access to unbiased financial advice
digital_behavior: Preference for visual and interactive content
Values trust and authority in financial matters
